QuestData.Title: An Urgent Plea
QuestData.Description: <Your mind is racked with a howl. Beneath it, a wispy voice is barely audible, as if from far away.>$B$BPlease... help... heart of the ruins... a ritual... conjuring...$B$B...should not be here...$B$BMy staff... on the altar... take it. Please hurry.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Take my staff from the altar and charge it with Ancient Spirits!
QuestData.LogDescription: Recover the Staff of Pei-Zhi and interrupt the mogu ritual in the center of the Terrace of Ten Thunders.
QuestData.CompletionText: Spirit-binding! How can the mogu have been allowed to resume such a disgusting practice?! And now here I am, the product of a half-failed conjuring...$B$B<The spirit fumes for a moment, then turns to you.>$B$BWhat century is this?
QuestData.RewardText: Allow me to introduce myself: I am Pei-Zhi, Master Spiritsage under the last pandaren emperor Shaohao.$B$BAt least... I was.
